Among the fiercest Raid Bosses, there are the ones called Grand Bosses!
They drop unique jewelry and some even drop uncraftable equipment such as Vorpal and Elegia!

Most Grand Bosses require a quest to be completed, before you can challenge them
For example you need a special stone to access the teleport to Antharas!
These bosses are the top of the monster chain, they require a large group of players to stand a chance against them

Good luck!
